description: This file initializes Mongoose models for a Node.js application by importing model definitions and setting up the database schemas and indexes.

methods.name: initMongooseModels
methods.description: Asynchronously imports and initializes Mongoose models, returning the models and Mongoose connection object.

methods.name: User.init
methods.description: Initializes the User schema, including setting up indexes.

methods.name: Room.init
methods.description: Initializes the Room schema, including indexes.

methods.name: Game.init
methods.description: Initializes the Game schema, including indexes.

methods.name: ChatMessage.init
methods.description: Initializes the ChatMessage schema, including indexes.

methods.name: PlayerStats.init
methods.description: Initializes the PlayerStats schema, including indexes.

methods.name: Leaderboard.init
methods.description: Initializes the Leaderboard schema, including indexes.

methods.name: SystemEvent.init
methods.description: Initializes the SystemEvent schema, including indexes.
